channel.title: My Game IMPROVED LOADS!
channel.description:
Play it here: http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/536814
Took me like a week and a half to make loads of sweet improvements, hope you guys enjoy. Thats a total of 5 and a half weeks on this game
Updates: [code]You now have skins to unlock and an expdoubler to unlock. Fixed out almost all bugs Added a sweet ass preloader Changed music to update Edited so screens stay throughout Edited so you cant levelup using 1min or 10 second mode[/code]
I've been working on this for a month and week now, hope you guys enjoy. PS: Davidi don't post unless you have made a version of this and aren't bullshitting like you did when i told you to make something in flash in my background creating thread PSS: Davidi don't say its because you cant be assed, we know you cant.

item.title: My Game IMPROVED LOADS!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I was fine leaving this thread for good, but people keep talking about me so I guess I shall reply.

Chemist:

this is really good, ignore that davidi guy… he seems to not like u for some reason

I would like to also point out to everybody:
I do not care how the game plays/looks, as this board is about programming. As Jme and another respected member has also said,

jme:

The actionscripting behind it is a few lines of code though. Any begginer could script the functionality of the game within a few minutes

casey.:

Though easy, it’s good programing experience.

So if you don’t believe what I said, you can believe them.

If you post a real code-heavy flash game, something that would be worth my efforts to recreate, I will gladly do so. Just don’t expect me to focus on the graphics, which is what this is.

Read full topic

item.title: My Game IMPROVED LOADS!
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:42, topic:340564”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=436932.msg3214850#msg3214850 date=1274585441]

Tbh im convinced you couldnt make this.

You did a fantastic job with the visual effects, sounds, music, etc.

The actionscripting behind it is a few lines of code though. Any begginer could script the functionality of the game within a few minutes
[/quote]This is exactly what I was trying to say.

Then please prove it; we’ll assume you can’t unless you do it.
[/quote]Feel free to assume whatever you want, I could not really care less.

If I wanted to prove my ‘flash skills’, I can guarantee it would not be something as simple as clicking a button. (Guess what, Flash has it’s own button object?! It must have taken Demise WEEKS to discover how to use it lol.)[/quote]

This is 500 lines actually. You clearly have no idea how flash works.
Stop spouting this pathetic shit to try and act superior and GTFO my thread

[quote=“jme, post:37, topic:340564”][quote author=DemisePking link=topic=436932.msg3214145#msg3214145 date=1274553384]
Tbh im convinced you couldnt make this.

You did a fantastic job with the visual effects, sounds, music, etc.

The actionscripting behind it is a few lines of code though. Any begginer could script the functionality of the game within a few minutes[/quote]

Clearly i was more orientated around the visual effects, and i understand that a more basic version could be done in around 20 lines of code

But i did more.

Read full topic

item.title: My Game IMPROVED LOADS!
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:35, topic:340564”][quote author=DemisePking link=topic=436932.msg3214087#msg3214087 date=1274549925]

Rofl, how did this take you a month and a week

Anyone that has ever taken Web Design 2 at my school (we learn flash, dw, fireworks etc) could make this in 2 hours?

Tbqh, I don’t understand why you think this is so hard to do.

I don’t have Flash at this house, but I can tell you exactly what you’d need to do in order to make the game if you want me to.

EDIT: Unlimited mode doesn’t even work lol. (EXP counter’s next to ‘Addiction’ don’t level up)

Idiot, those exp counters count your best score.

Now fucking make it and stop bullshitting
[/quote]Oic, so it makes a ton of sense to keep it there though. And I’m guessing it makes a ton of sense to you to have the 10 and 60 second best scores be the same?

And like I said, I can’t make it in flash without the program, but the theory is so simple anyone could do it.[/quote]

Perhaps they would like to see their best scores?
Tbh im convinced you couldnt make this.

Read full topic

item.title: My Game IMPROVED LOADS!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“DemisePking, post:34, topic:340564”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=436932.msg3214075#msg3214075 date=1274548999]
Rofl, how did this take you a month and a week

Anyone that has ever taken Web Design 2 at my school (we learn flash, dw, fireworks etc) could make this in 2 hours?

Tbqh, I don’t understand why you think this is so hard to do.

I don’t have Flash at this house, but I can tell you exactly what you’d need to do in order to make the game if you want me to.

EDIT: Unlimited mode doesn’t even work lol. (EXP counter’s next to ‘Addiction’ don’t level up)
[/quote]

Idiot, those exp counters count your best score.

Now fucking make it and stop bullshitting[/quote]Oic, so it makes a ton of sense to keep it there though. And I’m guessing it makes a ton of sense to you to have the 10 and 60 second best scores be the same?

And like I said, I can’t make it in flash without the program, but the theory is so simple anyone could do it.

Read full topic
